languages.text: "Ты говоришь о нем как об инструменте. Неужели ты не испытываешь привязанности к своему псу?"
"You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь о нем как об инструменте. Неужели ты не испытываешь привязанности к своему псу?"

traits.locale_text: "You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"
"You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"
"You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"
"You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"
"You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"
"You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"

languages.text: 「まるで道具みたいな言い方をするんだな。自分の犬に少しも愛着を感じないのか？」
languages.original_text: "You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"

traits.locale_text: 「まるで道具みたいな言い方をするんだな。自分の犬に少しも愛着を感じないのか？」

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht über ihn, als wäre er ein Werkzeug. Habt Ihr überhaupt keine Bindung zu Eurem Hund?"
languages.original_text: "You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht über ihn, als wäre er ein Werkzeug. Habt Ihr überhaupt keine Bindung zu Eurem Hund?"

languages.text: « Vous parlez de lui comme s'il s'agissait d'un outil. Vous ne vous êtes donc pas attaché à lui ? »
languages.original_text: "You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez de lui comme s'il s'agissait d'un outil. Vous ne vous êtes donc pas attaché à lui ? »

languages.text: «Habla de él como si fuese una herramienta. ¿Es que no siente el más mínimo apego por su perro?».
languages.original_text: "You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"

traits.locale_text: «Habla de él como si fuese una herramienta. ¿Es que no siente el más mínimo apego por su perro?».

languages.text: “你说得就好像格雷托只是件工具一样，你对你的狗真的没有一点感情吗？”
languages.original_text: "You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"

traits.locale_text: “你说得就好像格雷托只是件工具一样，你对你的狗真的没有一点感情吗？”

languages.text: "Sanki kendisi bir tür aletmiş gibi konuşuyorsun. Köpeğine hiç bağlılık hissetmiyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "You talk about him as if he were a tool. Do you not feel attached to your dog at all?"

traits.locale_text: "Sanki kendisi bir tür aletmiş gibi konuşuyorsun. Köpeğine hiç bağlılık hissetmiyor musun?"
